name: Deep Exploration
description:
This is a game prototype developed in 2 days for the Ludum Dare 48.

"Deep Exploration" is a 2D single player. George is a horned fish looking for the title of the King of the sea. In order to do that he must reach the seabed.

Authors: Lu Maurizio, Taranjit Singh 

Theme sound creator: Kim Lightyear
